reviews.review: I love gordon freeman so much I wish seattle was real.
This games reputation is well deserved
its good for a first person shooter and id suggest trying it
One of the best single player games i have ever played and a great squeal.
please help, i've played this game for 10 hours straight

An extremely good shooting game that I enjoyed. Simple and classic, lot's of fun. Just... not anything else, to be clear. A groundbreaking game for 2004, and it still baffles me that such graphics were possible at that time. But do not expect anything other than a good, classic shooting game. If that is what you want (and to be expecting Half-Life 3 forever), you're probably going to like it.

There isn't much that I can say about this game that hasn't already been said. For all intents and purposes it's a classic which, while linear, has a huge replayability.
Even though I played the game only one time it's one of my favourite games ever. A classic everyone should have played at least once.
